RESOURCE.NAME: Annotation schema
RESOURCE.COMMENT: An annotation type and its features (http://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/#sec:schemas)

PARAMETER.NAME: xmlFileUrl
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The url to the definition file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be tokenised

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations
The URL for the rules file
PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL

PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions
PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be tokenised

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: tokeniserRulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the rules file

PARAMETER.NAME: transducerGrammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the postprocessing transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerFeatureSeparator
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The character used to separate features for entries in gazetteer lists. Accepts strings like "\t" and will unescape it to the relevant character. If not specified, this gazetteer does not support extra features.

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists

PARAMETER.NAME: caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer diferentiate on case

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: wholeWordsOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match whole words

PARAMETER.NAME: longestMatchOnly
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer only match the longest string starting from any offset?

RESOURCE.NAME: Hash Gazetteer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A list lookup component implemented by OntoText Lab. For documentation, download and license agreement please refer to http://www.ontotext.com/downloads/index.html#gazetteer. The licence information is also available in licence.ontotext.html in the lib folder of GATE

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: listsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the file with list of lists
The encoding used for reading the definitions
PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
caseSensitive
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Should this gazetteer diferentiate on case. Currently the Gazetteer works only in case sensitive mode.

RESOURCE.NAME: Jape Transducer
RESOURCE.COMMENT: A module for executing Jape grammars (http://gate.ac.uk/sale/tao/#chap:jape).

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: grammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: binaryGrammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the grammar

PARAMETER.NAME: ontology
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The ontology to be used by this transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as input for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used as output for the transducer

PARAMETER.NAME: grammarURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the grammar
The document to be processed
PARAMETER.NAME: document
inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name used for the temporary annotation set

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name used for the temporary annotation set

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definition files

PARAMETER.NAME: gazetteerListsURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the custom list lookup definition file

PARAMETER.NAME: transducerURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL to the custom Jape grammar file

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: inputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for input

PARAMETER.NAME: outputASName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation set used for output

PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Encoding to use to read rules and lexicons

PARAMETER.NAME: lexiconURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the lexicon file

PARAMETER.NAME: rulesURL
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The URL for the ruleset file

PARAMETER.NAME: baseTokenAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the base Token annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: baseSentenceAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the base Sentence annotation type

PARAMETER.NAME: outputAnnotationType
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The name of the annotation type where the new features should be added
The URL for the definition file
PARAMETER.NAME: definitionFileURL

PARAMETER.COMMENT: The encoding used for reading the definitions
PARAMETER.NAME: encoding
document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations

PARAMETER.NAME: resolveIt
PARAMETER.COMMENT: Whether or not to resolve it pronouns

PARAMETER.NAME: document
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The document to be processed

PARAMETER.NAME: annotationSetName
PARAMETER.COMMENT: The annotation set to be used for the generated annotations
